5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa’eed Al-Khudri that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“When anyone of you has finished his prayer, let him give his house a share of that, for Allah will put something good in his house because of that prayer.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّطَوُّعِ فِي الْبَيْتِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning voluntary Prayers offered at home
